name: Goblin Invasion (jouzamapu)
description:
Goblin Invasion Is a pixel game inspired by Space Invader about an army of goblins invading the human kingdom walls. Instead of playing as the shooter defeating the invaders, you will play as the invader by controlling the goblin army. Lead the goblin army to victory or taste defeat by the archer's arrows.

Game Features:

  • 3 types of goblins
  • Various type of levels
  • Various challenging obstacles

Controls

"A" = Move the goblin army to the LEFT

"D" = Move the goblin army to the RIGHT

Notes : 

Play it in 1920x1080 Resolution

Set your monitor resolution at 1920 x 1080

Credits

Team LABGATOR

  • Enthusiastic Game Designer - Jouza M.A.P.
  • Hard Working Game Programmer - Raden Agung
  • Talented Game Artist - Mizan Alfarishi
